title: Chris Voss Explains the "Accusation Audit" to Jordan and Mikhaila Peterson
description:
Chris Voss (co-author of Never Split the Difference and former FBI lead hostage negotiator) explains what he calls an "accusation audit" and the importance of admitting your faults.

Full episode linked here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8bbBiKoONuk
